product_name: Midland ER200 Emergency Crank Compact Radio
long_description: Ideal for emergency kits, the ER200 keeps you informed and prepared if severe weather halts an adventure. Use 1 of 3 power options to check weather, signal help or shed light on your surroundings.
short_description: Ideal for emergency kits, the ER200 keeps you informed and prepared if severe weather halts an adventure. Use 1 of 3 power options to check weather, signal help or shed light on your surroundings.
